name: InfluxDB 1.0 Sink
shortDescription: Consume data from a Kafka topic in Quix and persist the data to an InfluxDB 3.0 database.

Variables.Name: INFLUXDB_HOST
Variables.Description: Host address for the InfluxDB instance (formatted as https://<host>).

Variables.Name: INFLUXDB_MEASUREMENT_NAME
Variables.Description: The InfluxDB measurement to write data to. Can optionally replace with a callable in the template directly.

Variables.Name: INFLUXDB_DATABASE
Variables.Description: Database name in InfluxDB where data should be stored.

Variables.Name: INFLUXDB_TAG_KEYS
Variables.Description: The tags to include when writing the measurement data. Example: Tag1,Tag2. Can optionally replace with a callable in the template directly.

Variables.Name: INFLUXDB_FIELD_KEYS
Variables.Description: The fields to include when writing the measurement data. Example: `Field1,Field2`. Can optionally replace with a callable in the template directly.

Variables.Name: CONSUMER_GROUP_NAME
Variables.Description: The name of the consumer group to use when consuming from Kafka

Variables.Name: TIMESTAMP_COLUMN
Variables.Description: The column containing the timestamp column. NOTE: Must be nanoseconds. Can optionally replace with a callable in the template directly.

Variables.Name: BUFFER_SIZE
Variables.Description: The number of records that sink holds before flush data to the InfluxDb

Variables.Name: BUFFER_TIMEOUT
Variables.Description: The number of seconds that sink holds before flush data to the InfluxDb
